import React from "react"; import "./ControlPins.css"; import photo from "./stm8blue-pinout.png"; import WriteValue from "./WriteValue"; class Config extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { inoutValuePD3: "", inoutValuePD2: "", inoutValuePD1: "", inoutValuePC7: "", inoutValuePC6: "", inoutValuePC5: "", inoutValuePC4: "", inoutValuePC3: "", inoutValuePB4: "", inoutValuePB5: "", inoutValuePD4: "", inoutValuePD5: "", inoutValuePD6: "", inoutValuePA1: "", inoutValuePA2: "", inoutValuePA3: "", }; this.handleInOutChange = this.handleInOutChange.bind(this); } handleInOutChange(event) { var pinName = event.target.value.substring; // console.log(pinName); switch (pinName) { case "oPD3": this.setState({ inoutValuePD3: event.target.value }, () => { console.log(this.state.inoutValuePD3); }); break; case "iPD3": this.setState({ inoutValuePD3: event.target.value }, () => { console.log(this.state.inoutValuePD3); }); break; case "PD2": this.setState({ inoutValuePD2: event.target.value }); break; case "PD1": this.setState({ inoutValuePD1: event.target.value }); break; case "PD6": this.setState({ inoutValuePD6: event.target.value }); break; case "PD5": this.setState({ inoutValuePD5: event.target.value }); break; case "PD4": this.setState({ inoutValuePD4: event.target.value }); break; case "PC7": this.setState({ inoutValuePC7: event.target.value }); break; case "PC6": this.setState({ inoutValuePC6: event.target.value }); break; case "PC5": this.setState({ inoutValuePC5: event.target.value }); break; case "PC4": this.setState({ inoutValuePC4: event.target.value }); break; case "PC3": this.setState({ inoutValuePC3: event.target.value }); break; case "PB4": this.setState({ inoutValuePB4: event.target.value }); break; case "PB5": this.setState({ inoutValuePB5: event.target.value }); break; case "PA1": this.setState({ inoutValuePA1: event.target.value }); break; case "PA2": this.setState({ inoutValuePA2: event.target.value }); break; case "PA3": this.setState({ inoutValuePA3: event.target.value }); break; default: } // console.log(pinName); } render() { return (


{/* set input/output list for right side pins */}
{/* set 0/1 value list for all pins */} {/* set input/output list for left side pins */}
); } } export default Config;
